es.title: Si usted utilizó material de enseñanza sobre Rust, ¿qué tipo de material ha utilizado?
options: Libros ("The Rust Programming Language", "Rust for Rustaceans", etc.)
Ejercicios online (Rustlings, Rust by Example, etc.)

en.title: If you used teaching materials on Rust, what type of material have you used?
options: Books ("The Rust Programming Language", "Rust for Rustaceans", etc.)
Online exercises (Rustlings, Rust by Example, etc.)
